wandb.company_desc: A leading AI startup specializing in experiment tracking, data versioning, hyperparameter tuning, and much more.
wandb.existing_feature_list:
1. System and custom metrics logging
2. Real-time experiment visualization
3. Comparing different hyperparameter results
4. Automated sweeps over different hyperparameters
5. Shareability by creating reports
6. Data version Control

langchain.company_desc: A young AI startup making it easier to use and connect Large Language Models (LLMs) to other tools such as Vector Database, Agents, Prompt Templates, and more.
langchain.existing_feature_list:
1. Models: A suite of pretrained LLMs
2. Prompts: Templates for prompt engineering and prompt tuning
3. Memory: Ability to connect LLMs to vector databases
4. Indexes: Text splitters
5. Chains: Chain multiple prompts and LLMs together
6. Agents: Drives decision making processes using LLMs
